plot: A young fairy entrusted to take care of a forest becomes mesmerized with her reflection and neglects her duties. Dire consequences follow.
title: Oriana
plot_es: A young fairy entrusted to take care of a forest becomes mesmerized with her reflection and neglects her duties. Dire consequences follow.
plot_en: A young fairy entrusted to take care of a forest becomes mesmerized with her reflection and neglects her duties. Dire consequences follow.
